BitField.name: AUXFAULT
BitField.description: Latched version of the AUXFAULT inputs

Enum.description: Access denied. Any attempted access generates a NOCP UsageFault
Privileged access only. An unprivileged access generates a NOCP fault.
Reserved. The result of any access is UNPREDICTABLE.
Full access.
Access denied. Any attempted access generates a NOCP UsageFault
Privileged access only. An unprivileged access generates a NOCP fault.
Reserved. The result of any access is UNPREDICTABLE.
Full access.
Lazy state preservation is not active.
Lazy state preservation is active. floating-point stack frame has been allocated but saving state to it has been deferred.

BitField.name: USER
BitField.description: Privilege level when the floating-point stack frame was allocated.

Enum.description: Privilege level was not user when the floating-point stack frame was allocated.
Privilege level was user when the floating-point stack frame was allocated.

BitField.name: THREAD
BitField.description: Mode when the floating-point stack frame was allocated.

Enum.description: Mode was not Thread Mode when the floating-point stack frame was allocated.
Mode was Thread Mode when the floating-point stack frame was allocated.

BitField.name: HFRDY
BitField.description: Permission to set the HardFault handler to the pending state when the floating-point stack frame was allocated.

Enum.description: Priority did not permit setting the HardFault handler to the pending state when the floating-point stack frame was allocated.
Priority permitted setting the HardFault handler to the pending state when the floating-point stack frame was allocated.

BitField.name: MMRDY
BitField.description: Permission to set the MemManage handler to the pending state when the floating-point stack frame was allocated.

Enum.description: MemManage is disabled or priority did not permit setting the MemManage handler to the pending state when the floating-point stack frame was allocated.
MemManage is enabled and priority permitted setting the MemManage handler to the pending state when the floating-point stack frame was allocated.

BitField.name: BFRDY
BitField.description: Permission to set the BusFault handler to the pending state when the floating-point stack frame was allocated.

Enum.description: BusFault is disabled or priority did not permit setting the BusFault handler to the pending state when the floating-point stack frame was allocated.
BusFault is disabled or priority did not permit setting the BusFault handler to the pending state when the floating-point stack frame was allocated.

BitField.name: MONRDY
BitField.description: Permission to set the MON_PEND when the floating-point stack frame was allocated.

Enum.description: DebugMonitor is disabled or priority did not permit setting MON_PEND when the floating-point stack frame was allocated.
DebugMonitor is enabled and priority permits setting MON_PEND when the floating-point stack frame was allocated.

BitField.name: LSPEN
BitField.description: Lazy state preservation for floating-point context.

Enum.description: Disable automatic lazy state preservation for floating-point context.
Enable automatic lazy state preservation for floating-point context.

BitField.name: ASPEN
BitField.description: Enables CONTROL2 setting on execution of a floating-point instruction. This results in automatic hardware state preservation and restoration, for floating-point context, on exception entry and exit.

Enum.description: Disable CONTROL2 setting on execution of a floating-point instruction.
Enable CONTROL2 setting on execution of a floating-point instruction.

BitField.name: ADDRESS
BitField.description: The location of the unpopulated floating-point register space allocated on an exception stack frame.

BitField.name: RMode
BitField.description: Default value for FPSCR.RMode (Rounding Mode control field).

Enum.description: Round to Nearest (RN) mode
Round towards Plus Infinity (RP) mode.
Round towards Minus Infinity (RM) mode.
Round towards Zero (RZ) mode.

BitField.name: FZ
BitField.description: Default value for FPSCR.FZ (Flush-to-zero mode control bit).

Enum.description: Flush-to-zero mode disabled. Behavior of the floating-point system is fully compliant with the IEEE 754 standard.
Flush-to-zero mode enabled.

BitField.name: DN
BitField.description: Default value for FPSCR.DN (Default NaN mode control bit).

Enum.description: NaN operands propagate through to the output of a floating-point operation.
Any operation involving one or more NaNs returns the Default NaN.

BitField.name: AHP
BitField.description: Default value for FPSCR.AHP (Alternative half-precision control bit).

Enum.description: IEEE half-precision format selected.
Alternative half-precision format selected.
counter disabled
counter enabled

counting down to 0 asserts the SysTick exception request

processor clock

BitField.name: RELOAD

BitField.name: CURRENT

BitField.name: TENMS
BitField.description: Reload value to use for 10ms timing

The reference clock is provided
The reference clock is not provided

BitField.name: INTLINESNUM
BitField.description: The total number of interrupt lines supported by an implementation, defined in groups of 32.

BitField.name: DISOOFP
BitField.description: Disables floating pointinstructions completing outof order with respect to integer instructions

BitField.name: DISFPCA
BitField.description: When set to 1, disables IT folding

BitField.name: DISFOLD
BitField.description: When set to 1, disables write buffer use during default memory map accesses

BitField.name: DISDEFWBUF
BitField.description: When set to 1, disables write buffer use during default memory map accesses

BitField.name: DISMCYCINT
BitField.description: When set to 1, disables interruption of load multiple and store multiple instructions

BitField.name: VECTPENDING
BitField.description: Indicates the exception number of the highest priority pending enabled exception

BitField.name: RETTOBASE
BitField.description: Indicates whether there are preempted active exceptions

Register.name: AIRCR
Register.description: Application Interrupt and Reset Control Register

BitField.name: SLEEPDEEP
BitField.description: Controls whether the processor uses sleep or deep sleep as its low power mode

BitField.name: SLEEPONEXIT
BitField.description: Indicates sleep-on-exit when returning from Handler mode to Thread mode

BitField.name: STKALIGN
BitField.description: Indicates stack alignment on exception entry

BitField.name: BFHFNMIGN
BitField.description: Enables handlers with priority -1 or-2 to ignore data BusFaults caused by load and store instructions

BitField.name: DIV_0_TRP
BitField.description: Enables faulting or halting when the processor executes an SDIVor UDIV instruction with a divisor of 0

BitField.name: USERSETMPEND
BitField.description: Enables unprivileged software access to the STIR

BitField.name: NONBASETHRDENA
BitField.description: Indicates how the processor enters Thread mode

Register.name: SHCSR
Register.description: System Handler Control and State Register

BitField.name: MMARVALID
BitField.description: MemManage Fault Address Register(MMFAR) valid flag

BitField.name: MLSPERR
BitField.description: Indicates a MemManage fault occurred during floating-point lazy state preservation

BitField.name: MSTKERR
BitField.description: MemManage fault on stacking for exception entry

BitField.name: MUNSTKERR
BitField.description: MemManage fault on unstacking for a return from exception

BitField.name: LSPERR
BitField.description: Indicates a bus fault occurred during floating-point lazy state preservation

BitField.name: STKERR
BitField.description: BusFault on stacking for exception entry

BitField.name: UNSTKERR
BitField.description: BusFault on unstacking for a return from exception

BitField.name: INVPC
BitField.description: Invalid PC load UsageFault, causedby an invalid PC load by EXC_RETURN

BitField.name: FORCED
BitField.description: Indicates a forced hard fault, generated by escalation of a fault with configurable priority that cannot be handled, either because of priority or because it is disabled

BitField.name: VECTTBL
BitField.description: Indicates a BusFault on a vectortable read during exception processing

BitField.name: ADDRESS
BitField.description: When the MMARVALID bit of the MMFSR is set to 1, this field holds the address of the location that generated the MemManage fault

BitField.name: ADDRESS
BitField.description: When the BFARVALID bit of the BFSR is set to1, this field holds the address of the location that generated the BusFault

BitField.name: IMPDEF
BitField.description: Implementation defined, the bits map to the AUXFAULT input signals

BitField.name: ADDRESSS
BitField.description: The location of the unpopulated floating-point register space allocated on an exception stack frame
